relation: Great for these types of students
I feel very safe there. Always see security around every corner.
They always have free breakfast and different activities to keep students pumped even during finals!
Great because they have the same classes as the local university!
MCC will save you thousands of dollars if you do your general classes at their campus and then transfer to ASU. Really great school!

I give Mesa Community College a 10 out of 10 Rating. They have great Teachers, Staff,and Resources to help their students succeed. I love that they have multiply campuses and are connected with the local University ASU.
pageTitle: Mesa Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {585256=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 44349=Over the past year, MCC has been expanding it's food and dining experience. Back in 2011, the lunch room was very modest, and pretty dull to be honest. The new updated 2012 room is more of a lounge or really large cafe. The food selection has grown, there are many tables, couches and chairs to lounge around on, plenty of vending machines, and an overall more relaxed environment, though it may become a bit loud a times. The food pricing is typical for any college; overpriced. In the end, I must applaud MCC for stepping their game up on this aspect., 409901=This is the place to decide what you want to do for the rest of your life. Take all the basic courses and figure out what subjects you enjoy the most. If you end up changing you're career then you only have to pay $1200 more instead of $12000 at most universities.}
textBeforeTable: 08/05/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 11 out of 11 people found this review useful. 1 of 148 Kristen from Mesa, AZ Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Will enjoy being here great people, diversity around, faculty helps out a lot Will learn a lot Great teachers Login to rate or flag the reviews Diondre from Mesa, AZ 12/23/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 3 of 148 Categories Comments Great for these types of students I think it's great for every type of student out there. There is something for everyone. Tips for prospective students Make sure to choose your teacher wisely because like at every institution there are teachers who enjoy teaching and there are teachers who could care less. Bang for the buck MCC is one of the cheaper colleges to attend but I don't think you get what you pay for...I think you get more. The curriculum is a little higher than
